name: Lane Crazy 254b
description:
4 lanes, 4 balls and too many holes!

Don't fall into the holes. Move using the controller, but in an awkward way! 

Each direction matches one lane, where the ball will switch its side. 

Everything clear? Sounds easier than it is!

A tribute to Richard/TND's game Lane Crazy.

(The text description above requires more bytes than the tic file of the game.)
